verses.name: Psalms 9:11
verses.text: Sing praises to the Lord, which dwelleth in Zion: declare among the people his doings.

verses.name: Psalms 9:12
verses.text: When he maketh inquisition for blood, he remembereth them: he forgetteth not the cry of the humble.

verses.name: Psalms 9:13
verses.text: Have mercy upon me, O Lord; consider my trouble which I suffer of them that hate me, thou that liftest me up from the gates of death:

verses.name: Psalms 9:14
verses.text: That I may shew forth all thy praise in the gates of the daughter of Zion: I will rejoice in thy salvation.
